cn.description:
感谢您使用FocusDots！这是一个简单的时间管理应用，将提高您的工作效率。

FocusDots是一个简单的时间管理应用，包含四个简单的步骤：

1) 决定要完成的单个任务。
2) 启动FocusDots并在计时器结束前（25分钟）专注于该任务。
3) 休息一下（5分钟）。
4) 完成四个Dots后，休息更长时间（15分钟）。

特点：

- 记一笔记账快捷又专业
- 账本首页流水页，数据呈现更清晰
- 云端存储数据，安全不丢失
- 账本操作必留痕，安全又省心

【海量账本模板，陪伴你的各个人生阶段】
to成长中的你：
- 高中生、大学生账本：生活费聪明花，课外兼职也能记
- 班费账本：班委管钱大家看，班费收支更透明
to工作中的你：

- 网约司机、健身教练、装修队长：职业账本专属定制
to爱生活的你：
- 合租、恋爱、生活账：日常生活随心记
- 旅游、宠物、爱好账：为自己所爱的事物，记录美好回忆

to创业中的你：

- 服装、代购、零售业：成本营收全把控，应收应付不遗漏
- 培训、酒店、服务业：各行各业全覆盖，首页报表指导经营
to顾家的你：

————献给热爱记账的你————
生活需要一点仪式感。 有人每天早上一定要喝一杯咖啡， 有人每天睡前一定要写两句日记， 也有人每天都把挣到的和花过的每一分钱记录下来 在快节奏的时代，扫一扫就完成付款，动动手指就能解决三餐、完成购物。 移动支付把生活中的花销从实实在在的钱变成了一串变动的数字，很多时候我们对于花钱没有了概念，甚至，想不起来把钱花在了哪里。 这时，需要消费后的用心记账，提高自己对钱的敏感度。 希望热爱记账的你梳理财务状况的时候可以沉浸在随手记这个“工作台”！

hk.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

hk.description:
組合強大的猴子塔和令人敬畏的英雄，打造完美防綫，擊破所有入侵的氣球！

超過十年的塔防遊戲開發經驗和定期的大規模更新讓《Bloons TD 6》成為數百萬玩家最喜愛的遊戲。現在就玩《Bloons TD 6》，享受無盡的策略遊戲樂趣！

海量內容更新！
*定期更新！ 我們每年都會發佈幾個更新，推出新的角色、功能和玩法。
*頭目活動！ 可怕的頭目氣球將挑戰最強大的防線。
*征程模式！完成由一系列地圖組成的戰鬥，通常按主題、規則和獎勵劃分。
*爭議領土！和其他玩家組成戰隊，攜手對抗五支其他戰隊，爭奪領土。奪取共同地圖上的地塊，在排行榜上展開競爭。
*任務！ 透過任務深入瞭解猴子的特點，體驗精彩劇情並分享知識。
* 獎盃商店！ 賺取獎盃即可解鎖幾十種裝飾品，並自訂猴子、氣球、動畫、音樂等等。
* 內容瀏覽器！建立你自己的挑戰和征程模式，然後與其他玩家分享，並檢視最受歡迎和玩家最多的社群內容。

史詩級猴子塔和英雄！
* 23種強力猴子塔，每一種都有三條升級路線和不同的激活技能。
* 巔峰！ 探索最新的巔峰升級所帶來的不可思議的力量。
* 16個不同的英雄，每一個都有20項標誌性的升級和2個特殊技能，另有皮膚和配音等待你去解鎖！


精彩無限！
* 4人合作！ 在公開或私人遊戲中與多達3個其他玩家一起暢玩每張地圖和每種模式。 
* 隨時隨地暢玩 – 即時沒有WiFi，也可通過單人模式享受遊戲樂趣！
* 70+張手工繪製地圖，每次更新都會新增更多地圖。
* 猴子知識！超過100項元升級，根據需要提升力量！
* 力量和即時猴子！享受透過遊戲，活動和成就獲得！ 立即提升力量，助你應對棘手的地圖和模式。



我們儘可能多地將大量內容放入每一次更新，我們會繼續通過定期更新為你帶來新的功能、內容和挑。
我們十分尊重你投入的時間和提供的支持，我們希望《Bloons TD 6》成為你玩過的最優秀的戰略遊戲。
如果遊戲未能達到你的理想，請透過https://support.ninjakiwi.com與我們聯絡，告訴我們如何改進！
那些氣球可不會乖乖束手就擒……做好戰鬥準備，開始《Bloons TD 6》吧！

hk.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

hk.description:
Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility.

* FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan.
* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.
* LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home.
* WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan.

Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be.

For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com

https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/

mo.releaseNotes: 本次更新強化了應用穩定性，希望你會喜歡！
mo.description:
《泡麵》使用者平均一分鐘就能夠製作出一張語錄圖片，速度比實際泡一碗泡麵還要快！

有時候，靈感在一瞬之間就溜走了，但是有了《泡麵》，你能夠即時記錄靈感並製成圖片，輕鬆分享到自己的社群平台！

【狂賀】連續 3 年榮獲多家媒體報導
• 《流動日報》 —— 2019/10/22、2018/11/01
• 《電獺少女》 —— 2017/10/19
• 《重灌狂人》 —— 2017/10/19

【感謝】網友一致盛讚
• 這是我一直在期待的app！好用（By 匿名鰐魚）
• 非常簡潔有力的APP ......太可愛了！（By 爆肝的菜鳥工程師）
• 更多好評持續蒐集中，歡迎你留下評論，讓我們為你做得更好！

【泡麵】是什麼？
《泡麵》是一款專為語錄控及社群小編設計的文字編輯軟體，不只內附多款文字顏色與字型供創作使用，還能夠加入個人浮水印與企業 Logo。使用《泡麵》，你可以快速地在泡一碗泡麵的時間裡就做出一張語錄圖片。此外，用久了你還會發現一件事：《泡麵》不只有快，還意外地很療癒！

【泡麵】可以做什麼？
• 語錄圖
• 單字卡
• 長輩圖
• 便條紙
• 邀請函
• 心情紀錄
• 社群貼文等

【經典原味】有什麼特色？
• 多達 10 種豐富字體
• 自訂文字、背景、邊框顏色
• 從相簿挑選照片當作背景
• 搜尋免費圖庫上海量圖片素材
• 套用多款濾鏡與霧化特效到照片上
• 為圖片添加手寫簽名
• 編輯與收藏幸運籤詩
• 全 App 內無廣告，版面乾淨不擾人

【適用】社群軟體
• Instagram（推薦使用）
• Facebook
• Messenger
• WhatsApp
• Line
• 微信
• 微博
• 還有更多期待你來發掘！

mo.description:
感謝您使用FocusDots！這是一個簡單的時間管理應用，將提高您的工作效率。

有時候，保持注意力集中在任務上可能並不容易。FocusDots是一個精美設計的計時器，旨在提高您對任務的專注，並丟棄可能分散注意力的活動。

FocusDots是一個簡單的時間管理應用，包含四個簡單的步驟：

1) 決定要完成的單個任務。
2) 啟動FocusDots並在計時器結束前（25分鐘）專注於該任務。
3) 休息一下（5分鐘）。
4) 完成四個Dots後，休息更長時間（15分鐘）。

特點：
- 優雅的極簡設計
- 每日總結
- 精美設計主題
- 激勵引用語
- 可為您的任務自定義計時器時長

感謝您選擇FocusDots！我們由衷感謝您的支持，希望我們的應用能幫助您提高生產力和時間管理技巧。如果您有任何反饋或建議，我們非常樂意聽取！

mo.description:

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. 【泡麵】是什麼？
《泡麵》是一款專為語錄控及社群小編設計的文字編輯軟體，不只內附多款文字顏色與字型供創作使用，還能夠加入個人浮水印與企業 Logo。使用《泡麵》，你可以快速地在泡一碗泡麵的時間裡就做出一張語錄圖片。此外，用久了你還會發現一件事：《泡麵》不只有快，還意外地很療癒！

【泡麵】可以做什麼？
• 語錄圖
• 單字卡
• 長輩圖
• 便條紙
• 邀請函
• 心情紀錄
• 社群貼文等

【經典原味】有什麼特色？
• 多達 10 種豐富字體
• 自訂文字、背景、邊框顏色
• 從相簿挑選照片當作背景
• 搜尋免費圖庫上海量圖片素材
• 套用多款濾鏡與霧化特效到照片上
• 為圖片添加手寫簽名
• 編輯與收藏幸運籤詩
• 全 App 內無廣告，版面乾淨不擾人

【適用】社群軟體
• Instagram（推薦使用）
• Facebook
• Messenger
• WhatsApp
• Line
• 微信
• 微博
• 還有更多期待你來發掘！

tw.description:
Play local music or stream from a file/media server with LMP. 

Apple TV version included, with support for Emby, Navidrome, Plex, and Jellyfin.

▣ Import via iTunes or folder and play local tracks

LMP was designed from scratch with offline music in mind. You can store music on your device in two forms: iTunes music or audio file. The first would require syncing with iTunes on Windows or Finder on Mac. To import as audio files, simply transfer them to the LMP Music folder on your device via any means. If you choose the latter, you will be able to enjoy additional features, such as editing of metadata via the LMP browser assistant.

▣ Connect to a cloud server and stream music from the server

If you have insufficient storage on your device, you can also store your tracks on a server and stream from the server. File servers using SMB and WebDAV are supported. However, we recommend hosting a media server instead, via Plex, Emby, Navidrome or Subsonic due to faster import speeds. All tracks come together seamlessly, no matter how they are imported, providing a unified experience. You can enable the option in the settings to hide repeated tracks across servers.

▣ Manage playlists with ease

LMP has its own playlist system that allows you to not only add tracks from all sources, but also artists. All tracks belonging to the artist would automatically be added to the playlist everytime you open the app or rescan, even newly added ones. With flexible artist splitting, you will be able to ensure that tracks get allocated to the right artist.

When the AI playlist is enabled, LMP will also be able to generate a playlist for you based on your listening preferences. Usage data is only recorded if this feature is enabled, and all data recorded for this is stored locally, so you do not have to worry about data privacy.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

tw.releaseNotes:
全新亡命之猴塔！
• 全新初級猴來到了鎮上！亡命之猴是一隻擅長用槍的猴子，牠槍不離身，隨時可以開戰。牠的好搭檔有：雙左輪手槍，適用於遠程作戰的步槍，以及能炸飛氣球的短程霰彈槍。
• 新增介紹亡命之猴生平的故事任務，任何英雄皆能進行的挑戰任務，以及「Rogue傳奇」中的一猴當關神器！
• 全新高級地圖日落峽谷。在這個地圖中，氣球會沿著峽谷高處路徑前進，而MOAB級氣球則會沿著鐵軌移動。
• 還有平衡性改動、遊戲體驗改善以及獎盃商店妝扮等更多內容！
tw.description:
組合強大的猴子塔和令人敬畏的英雄，打造完美防綫，擊破所有入侵的氣球！

超過十年的塔防遊戲開發經驗和定期的大規模更新讓《Bloons TD 6》成為數百萬玩家最喜愛的遊戲。現在就玩《Bloons TD 6》，享受無盡的策略遊戲樂趣！

海量內容更新！
*定期更新！ 我們每年都會發佈幾個更新，推出新的角色、功能和玩法。
*頭目活動！ 可怕的頭目氣球將挑戰最強大的防線。
*征程模式！完成由一系列地圖組成的戰鬥，通常按主題、規則和獎勵劃分。
*爭議領土！和其他玩家組成戰隊，攜手對抗五支其他戰隊，爭奪領土。奪取共同地圖上的地塊，在排行榜上展開競爭。
*任務！ 透過任務深入瞭解猴子的特點，體驗精彩劇情並分享知識。
* 獎盃商店！ 賺取獎盃即可解鎖幾十種裝飾品，並自訂猴子、氣球、動畫、音樂等等。
* 內容瀏覽器！建立你自己的挑戰和征程模式，然後與其他玩家分享，並檢視最受歡迎和玩家最多的社群內容。

史詩級猴子塔和英雄！
* 23種強力猴子塔，每一種都有三條升級路線和不同的激活技能。
* 巔峰！ 探索最新的巔峰升級所帶來的不可思議的力量。
* 16個不同的英雄，每一個都有20項標誌性的升級和2個特殊技能，另有皮膚和配音等待你去解鎖！


精彩無限！
* 4人合作！ 在公開或私人遊戲中與多達3個其他玩家一起暢玩每張地圖和每種模式。 
* 隨時隨地暢玩 – 即時沒有WiFi，也可通過單人模式享受遊戲樂趣！
* 70+張手工繪製地圖，每次更新都會新增更多地圖。
* 猴子知識！超過100項元升級，根據需要提升力量！
* 力量和即時猴子！享受透過遊戲，活動和成就獲得！ 立即提升力量，助你應對棘手的地圖和模式。



我們儘可能多地將大量內容放入每一次更新，我們會繼續通過定期更新為你帶來新的功能、內容和挑。
我們十分尊重你投入的時間和提供的支持，我們希望《Bloons TD 6》成為你玩過的最優秀的戰略遊戲。
如果遊戲未能達到你的理想，請透過https://support.ninjakiwi.com與我們聯絡，告訴我們如何改進！
那些氣球可不會乖乖束手就擒……做好戰鬥準備，開始《Bloons TD 6》吧！



**********

* COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs.
* NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home.
* BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed.
* SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters.
* WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home.
* SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost.
* MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken.

us.description:
A Simple Time Management App That Will Increase Your Productivity

Keeping yourself focused on tasks can be not easy sometimes. FocusDots is a beautifully designed timer to improve your focus on tasks and discard activity that can divert your attention. 

FocusDots is a simple time management app with four easy steps:
1) Decide on a single task to be done.
2) Start FocusDots and work on the task until the timer finishes (25 minutes).
3) Take a short break (5 minutes).
4) After completing four Dots, go for a longer break (15 minutes)

Features
- Elegant minimalist design
- Daily Summary
- Beautiful crafted design themes
- Quotes to inspire and motivate you
- Custom timer duration for your tasks


Thank you for choosing FocusDots! We sincerely appreciate your support and hope that our app helps you enhance your productivity and time management skills. If you have any feedback or suggestions, we'd love to hear from you!

us.releaseNotes:
New Desperado Tower! + Bug Fixes
• A new Primary Monkey strolls into town! Desperado is a gun-slinging Monkey that always has a pistol holstered and ready. Dual wield revolvers, add a rifle for long range work, or a short range shotgun for blastin' Bloons.
• A Tales Quest to introduce Desperado, and a Challenge Quest for any Hero, with the One Monkey Army Artifact from Rogue Legends!
• New Advanced map, Sunset Gulch. A high Bloon path spanning a gulch with a railway track that the MOABs follow.
• Plus balance changes, QoL improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
us.description:
Craft your perfect defense from a combination of powerful Monkey Towers and awesome Heroes, then pop every last invading Bloon!

Over a decade of tower defense pedigree and regular massive updates makes Bloons TD 6 a favorite game for millions of players. Enjoy endless hours of strategy gaming with Bloons TD 6!

HUGE CONTENT!
* Regular updates! We release several updates every year with new characters, features, and gameplay.
* Boss Events! Fearsome Boss Bloons will challenge even the strongest defenses.
* Odysseys! Battle through a series of maps connected by their theme, rules, and rewards.
* Contested Territory! Join forces with other players and battle for territory against five other teams. Capture tiles on a shared map and compete on the leaderboards.
* Quests! Delve into what makes the Monkeys tick with Quests, crafted to tell tales and share knowledge.
* Trophy Store! Earn Trophies to unlock dozens of cosmetic items that let you customize your Monkeys, Bloons, animations, music, and more.
* Content Browser! Create your own Challenges and Odysseys, then share them with other players and check out the most liked and played community content.

EPIC MONKEY TOWERS & HEROES!
* 25 powerful Monkey Towers, each with 3 upgrade paths and unique activated abilities.
* Paragons! Explore the incredible power of the newest Paragon upgrades.
* 16 diverse Heroes, with 20 signature upgrades and 2 special abilities. Plus, unlockable skins and voiceovers!

ENDLESS AWESOMENESS!
* 4-Player Co-Op! Play every map and mode with up to 3 other players in public or private games.
* Play anywhere - single player offline works even when your WiFi doesn’t!
* 70+ handcrafted maps, with more added every update.
* Monkey Knowledge! Over 100 meta-upgrades to add power where you need it.
* Powers and Insta Monkeys! Earned through gameplay, events, and achievements. Instantly add power for tricky maps and modes.

We pack as much content and polish into each update as possible, and we’ll continue to add new features, content, and challenges in regular updates.

We truly respect your time and support, and we hope Bloons TD 6 will be the best strategy game you’ve ever played. If it’s not, please contact us at https://support.ninjakiwi.com and tell us what we can do better!

Now those Bloons aren't going to pop themselves... sharpen your darts and go play Bloons TD 6!


**********

Ninja Kiwi Community:
We love hearing from our players, so please get in touch with any feedback, positive or negative, at https://support.ninjakiwi.com.

Streamers and Video Creators: 
Ninja Kiwi is actively promoting channel creators on YouTube and Twitch! If you are not already working with us, keep making videos and tell us about your channel at streamers@ninjakiwi.com.

us.description:
MOTORSPORT MANAGER 4: MASTER RACE STRATEGY

BUILD YOUR RACING DYNASTY
Immerse yourself in the captivating journey of constructing your motorsport empire from the ground up, where every choice holds the key to your success.

ASSEMBLE YOUR DREAM TEAM
Hand-pick exceptional drivers and engineer a world-class racing powerhouse. Collaborate closely with drivers to secure pole positions and craft pitstop strategies that lead to race domination.

REAL-TIME STRATEGY UNFOLDS
Experience the adrenaline-pumping action of races in real-time or navigate through intricate strategy screens. Swiftly adapt to ever-changing weather, unexpected crashes, and the emergence of safety cars.

UNLEASH VARIETY ON THE TRACK
Embark on thrilling GT and Endurance racing adventures across six distinct championships. Immerse yourself in the iconic beauty of Monaco's settings, rendered in breathtaking artistry.

DRIVERS TAKE CENTER STAGE
Step into the shoes of promising new drivers, delve into their statistics, and cultivate pivotal relationships. Navigate the revamped HQ, seize upgrade opportunities, and master the new part development system for an immersive journey.

YOUR JOURNEY, YOUR CHALLENGE
Embark on a motorsport odyssey where every choice shapes your destiny. Witness dynamic AI team movements and adjust the difficulty level as the game evolves with you.

SEIZE CONTROL, MAKE HISTORY
It's your opportunity to rewrite the annals of racing lore and etch your name into the history of motorsport. Motorsport Manager 4 empowers you like never before.

us.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.

tr.description:
"Sky Band" is a tool app for composing and practicing music for "Sky: Children of the Light" game players.

[Main Feature]
1. Like "Garage Band", quickly compose music.
2. Practice score on different instruments like playing a music game.
3. Share scores between users.

[Compose Score]
1. Support recording and playback.
2. Support magnetic adsorption and fine tuning, the minimum unit is 1/64th note.
3. Support metronome, chords, multi-part recording and other advanced features.

[Practice Score]
1. Provide three modes: follow mode, free mode, grade mode
2. Support basic features such as scaling the size of the score, count-in, metronome, tempo adjustment, etc
3. Support tonic mode, AB cycle, particle effect and other advanced features.

▣ Supports CarPlay & Siri

With support for CarPlay, you can start playing a playlist or control what's playing from your car's CarPlay console. Alternatively, you can also tell Siri to start playing a track or all tracks belonging to a particular artist, or use it to control the playback state of the current track.

▣ Support LRC lyrics

LMP supports both embedded lyrics and .lrc files. Use the LRC or Enhanced LRC format, and the app will be able to autoscroll lyrics as the music plays. If you do not have time to add your own lyrics, you can specify the lyrics API to use, and the app will attempt to fetch lyrics of any track that is playing.

▣ Browser Assistant

Manage local files on the app using the LMP browser assistant, which you can open on your computer's browser. Import new files or move/delete existing files using the Folders tool, edit music metadata using the Metadata tool or even manage your playlists using the playlists tool.

New Desperado Tower! + Bug Fixes
• A new Primary Monkey strolls into town! Desperado is a gun-slinging Monkey that always has a pistol holstered and ready. Dual wield revolvers, add a rifle for long range work, or a short range shotgun for blastin' Bloons.
• A Tales Quest to introduce Desperado, and a Challenge Quest for any Hero, with the One Monkey Army Artifact from Rogue Legends!

tr.description:
Craft your perfect defense from a combination of powerful Monkey Towers and awesome Heroes, then pop every last invading Bloon!

Over a decade of tower defense pedigree and regular massive updates makes Bloons TD 6 a favorite game for millions of players. Enjoy endless hours of strategy gaming with Bloons TD 6!

HUGE CONTENT!
* Regular updates! We release several updates every year with new characters, features, and gameplay.
* Boss Events! Fearsome Boss Bloons will challenge even the strongest defenses.
* Odysseys! Battle through a series of maps connected by their theme, rules, and rewards.
* Contested Territory! Join forces with other players and battle for territory against five other teams. Capture tiles on a shared map and compete on the leaderboards.
* Quests! Delve into what makes the Monkeys tick with Quests, crafted to tell tales and share knowledge.
* Trophy Store! Earn Trophies to unlock dozens of cosmetic items that let you customize your Monkeys, Bloons, animations, music, and more.
* Content Browser! Create your own Challenges and Odysseys, then share them with other players and check out the most liked and played community content.

EPIC MONKEY TOWERS & HEROES!
* 25 powerful Monkey Towers, each with 3 upgrade paths and unique activated abilities.
* Paragons! Explore the incredible power of the newest Paragon upgrades.
* 16 diverse Heroes, with 20 signature upgrades and 2 special abilities. Plus, unlockable skins and voiceovers!

ENDLESS AWESOMENESS!
* 4-Player Co-Op! Play every map and mode with up to 3 other players in public or private games.
* Play anywhere - single player offline works even when your WiFi doesn’t!
* 70+ handcrafted maps, with more added every update.
* Monkey Knowledge! Over 100 meta-upgrades to add power where you need it.
* Powers and Insta Monkeys! Earned through gameplay, events, and achievements. Instantly add power for tricky maps and modes.

We pack as much content and polish into each update as possible, and we’ll continue to add new features, content, and challenges in regular updates.

We truly respect your time and support, and we hope Bloons TD 6 will be the best strategy game you’ve ever played. If it’s not, please contact us at https://support.ninjakiwi.com and tell us what we can do better!

Now those Bloons aren't going to pop themselves... sharpen your darts and go play Bloons TD 6!


**********

https://ninjakiwi.com/privacy_policy

Bloons TD 6 contains in-game items that can be purchased with real money. You can disable in-app purchases in your device's settings, or reach us at https://support.ninjakiwi.com for help. Your purchases fund our development updates and new games, and we sincerely appreciate every vote of confidence you give us with your purchases. 

Ninja Kiwi Community:
We love hearing from our players, so please get in touch with any feedback, positive or negative, at https://support.ninjakiwi.com.

Streamers and Video Creators: 
Ninja Kiwi is actively promoting channel creators on YouTube and Twitch! If you are not already working with us, keep making videos and tell us about your channel at streamers@ninjakiwi.com.

tr.description:
Escape your childhood fears.

First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile!
 Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears!
Help Six escape The Maw – a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal.
As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover.
Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out!
Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design.
Sneak your way out of the Maw’s dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. 

FEATURES

- Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure
- Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants
- Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles
- Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design

CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE

- Revamped interface
- Game Center achievements
- Compatible with MFi controllers

If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.
